page.title: 06Employment.
page.content: There are no big factories in Sawbridgeworth.Walter Lawrences,the door manufacturers used to have 150 people working for them,but now they have only twenty.Quite a few people work in the many small offices,especially building societies,estate agents,solicitors,banks and accountants.The small light industrial units at the{'Maltings'}offer a variety of jobs. The largest employer in{Sheering}is a roofing contractor who employs up to 150 people in the summer but very few live locally.The farms also have seasonal jobs but very few in winter.13 people work at the school.The three small shops employ about six people and the pubs four each.A few people work at the Village Hall.
